help-tour-steps.content: Hello, and welcome to the SciGateway! This tour will show you the important features of the app!
Click here to sign in if you're not logged in, or sign out or manage your account if you are logged in
Click here to see any notifications you have
Click here to change settings for cookies and darkmode
Click here to contact the support team with any issues or feedback
Click here to open the navigation menu
